content: Given the DefId of a local trait impl block, what's the best way to get the HIR for its child items (the function definitions inside it)?

By using let item = tcx.hir().expect_item(def_id) you will have access to the item. item.kind is ashould be hir::ItemKind::Impl which contains the hir::Impl object. This hir::Impl` contains the references to all he child impl-item.
